text: Hasaballah Mohamed El Kafrawy (, 22 November 1930 â€“ 5 August 2021) was an Egyptian engineer and politician. He was Minister of Housing of Egypt from September 1977 to October 1993 during the Hosni Mubarak presidency. He was also governor of the Damietta Governorate from 1976 until 1977. El Kafrawy was born in Kafr Saad, Egypt. El Kafrawy died on 5 August 2021 in Cairo, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Egyptian politicians Category:Egyptian engineers Category:Civil engineers Category:Damietta Governorate
title: Hassaballah El Kafrawy
